snippet.title: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night - Preorder Now! (PEGI)
snippet.description:
It's happening!!! Pre-orders are now available for Koji Igarashi’s gothic dark fantasy side-scrolling action RPG "Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night" on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and PC (Steam and GOG)! :D 

Visit https://playbloodstained.com to preorder now!

Bloodstained will launch (digital and physical retail) for PlayStation 4, Xbox One and on PC (Steam and GOG) on Tuesday, June 18, 2019. Nintendo Switch will launch on June 25th. Global launch dates will vary by region. 

Pre-order Bonuses:
* Steam & GoG: 10% pre-order discount
* PlayStation: Exclusive Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night dynamic theme. Current PlayStation Plus subscribers will receive a 10% discount
* BestBuy - Option to add an exclusive collector Novobox futurepak for physical pre-orders for PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch. 

By the way, there's a ton of FREE DLC coming after launch! Online and local multiplayer, and almost a dozen extra game modes including roguelike mode, boss rush, speedrun, and nightmare difficulty to name just a few...

You could say we're trying to emulate a certain Polish red bird we like...

Tell your friends, your family, enemies, pets, toaster, anyone and everyone that can hold a controller! 

Join Bloodstained’s army of the night!
Discord - https://discord.gg/bloodstained
Forums - https://bloodstained.forums.net/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/SwordOrWhip
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/bloodstainedrotn/
